text: one of the best tv-ep renamers out there! kudos! to the author, rednoah
best app on series renaming i could find
one of the most liked "must have" programs i use. much thanks to author!
One of the best (if not the best) multiplatform episode renamer/subtitle downloader
indispensable tool for people with a large library of videos. Through this program, I was able to restore order in films and serials. Thank you!
A must use tool. Really simplifies watching my favorite movies
Extremely quick and efficient. Great for renaming anime, too - I was very impressed at Filebot's ability to consistently rename anime using AniDB. A must for keeping a large collection clean!
Extremely efficient.. especially for renaming single episodes.
easy to use and easy to work. thanks a lot!
Kudos :) Great time saver keeping my collection organized. Stable, useful, easy to use. Donation has been made. Keep up the good work
Pretty awesome piece of software. Very fast and easy to use. As it states: "it just works".

Wow, thank you so much for this program. I had a large collection of tv shows which I was not looking forward to sorting out. Dumped the files into FileBot and within minutes, all done. Even finds correct name within filenames with a load of junk in them.
I can really recommend using filebot for sorting, moving, deleting, subtitle searching... I just started the script once... and it was quite mindblowing to be honest.
